price: Tí ó bá jẹ́ pé wọ́n rí ibùsásí kan, tàbí àwọn ihò àpáta kan, tàbí ibùsáwọ̀ kan, wọn ìbá ṣẹ́rí síbẹ̀ ní wéréwéré.
arabic: لَوۡ يَجِدُونَ مَلۡجَـًٔا أَوۡ مَغَٰرَٰتٍ أَوۡ مُدَّخَلٗا لَّوَلَّوۡاْ إِلَيۡهِ وَهُمۡ يَجۡمَحُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: law yajidūna malja-an aw maghārātin aw muddakhalan lawallaw ilayhi wahum yajmaḥūna
